title: Drawing, "International Casino: Sofas, Second Floor Wing", June 14, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions throughout; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 546-68; INT. CAS.; Olsson / 6/14/37; 6/15/37 1 BRECKER / " 2 WEISS / 6/16/37 5 BRECKER / 8/2/37 1 WEISS / 8/11 1 EMPIRE / 9/9/37 1 OFFICE; above stamp: 2nd FLOOR - WING/REVISION 7/2/37 SHOWING LOCATION/OF COLOR CHANGES ON WALL/COVER: BROWN, WHITE & RED STRIPE/STRIPES TO RUN HORIZONTALLY
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for series of sofas on second floor wing. Four long sofas with arms separated by small rectangular end table; two stacked open shelves on table. Each sofa made up of two parts, and seats eight people. Plan shows four small, rectangular tables in front of each sofa. Wall color behind sofas change (from left to right in perspective drawing): white, red, blue, and white. Sofa upholstered in horizontal stripes of browb, white and red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Sofas, Second Floor Wing", June 14, 1937.
June 14, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-206.
